details_field.description: Label for a single field in the item details

details_fields.description: Label for multiple fields in the item details

details_password_overlay.message: This password is only available in your Vault.
details_password_overlay.description: Message indicating that the password is stored only in the user's Vault

details_password_decrypt_error.message: Decrypting password error. Please resync with your mobile app.
details_password_decrypt_error.description: Error message displayed when decrypting the password fails

details_secure_note_decrypt_error.message: Decrypting secure note error. Please resync with your mobile app.
details_secure_note_decrypt_error.description: Error message displayed when decrypting the secure note fails

details_delete_header.description: Header for the delete login confirmation section

details_delete.message: Delete this Item from your Vault
details_delete.description: Button label to delete the item from the Vault

details_name_required.description: Validation message indicating that the name field is required

details_name_max_length.message: Name must be less than 256 characters.
details_name_max_length.description: Validation message indicating the maximum length for the name field

details_username_max_length.message: Username must be less than 256 characters.
details_username_max_length.description: Validation message indicating the maximum length for the username field

details_uri_max_length.message: URL must be less than 2048 characters.
details_uri_max_length.description: Validation message indicating the maximum length for the URL field

details_item_not_found.message: Something went wrong. Item not found. Sync with your mobile app and try again.
details_item_not_found.description: Error shown when the requested item is not found, suggesting reconnection

details_security_type.description: Label for the security type field in the item details

details_add_domain.description: Button label to add a new domain to the login item

details_add_another_domain.description: Button label to add another domain when at least one exists

details_domain_uri.description: Header label for domain section with URI number

details_no_domain_available.description: Text shown when no domain is assigned to the item

details_name_copied.description: Success message shown when the name is copied to clipboard

details_change_password_in_service.description: Button label to open the service's password change page

details_change_password_in_service_title.message: Open the service website in a new tab to change the password
details_change_password_in_service_title.description: Title for the change password section in the service

details_toggle_password_visibility.description: Title for the button that toggles password visibility

details_generate_password.description: Title for the button that opens password generator

details_fetch_text.message: Data available only in the mobile app.
details_fetch_text.description: Text indicating that some data can be fetched from the mobile app

details_fetch_title.description: Title for the fetch highly secret data link

details_sif_not_fetched.message: This information is only available on your mobile phone. Click the "Fetch" button at the top of this window to retrieve it.
details_sif_not_fetched.description: Message indicating that the highly secret data has not been fetched yet

details_notes_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the notes input field

details_reveal_secure_note.description: Button label to reveal the secure note content

details_additional_info.description: Label for the additional info field in the item details

details_additional_info_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the additional info input field

details_card_number.description: Label for the card number field in payment card details

details_card_number_decrypt_error.description: Error message displayed when decrypting the card number fails

details_toggle_card_number_visibility.description: Title for the button that toggles card number visibility

details_expiration_date_decrypt_error.description: Error message displayed when decrypting the expiration date fails

details_toggle_expiration_date_visibilit.description: Title for the button that toggles expiration date visibility

details_security_code_decrypt_error.description: Error message displayed when decrypting the security code fails

details_cardholder_max_length.description: Validation message indicating the maximum length for the cardholder field
